transArray.content: The environment is beautiful, the hotel is located on Qianmen Street, the location is good, the transportation is convenient, the room is comfortable and hygienic, the service staff is very enthusiastic and willing to provide all kinds of help, not only helping me change the room to a room with a window, but also reminding me that there is no bathrobe in the room It was resolved within a few minutes after I came out, and I was also helped to delay my check-out until 2:00 in the afternoon. The service attitude is very goodüëç. The facilities are very user-friendly, the high-speed network signal is good, and the scenery outside the window is good. Good value for money, will stay again next time
